website_summaries.verdict: Reliable, easy to set up, and economically priced. Offers the option to buy a waterproof button if you don't have an outdoor area protected from rain.
pros: Comes with two buttons and three chimes
Works right out of the box and includes everything you need to mount the units
Buttons are weather-resistant, but you can buy a truly waterproof, compatible button separately
cons: Over 50 chimes to choose from, but a few customers complain that most of them are annoying or grating
Chimes must be plugged in, limiting placement options

customer_reviews.title: car vacuum
customer_reviews.text: The speed of the delivery is great. So when the stuff arrived, I couldn't wait to open it and use it. The vacuum cleaner was very easy to use and never worried about my son eating cookies in the car.
customer_reviews.author: NING GAN

customer_reviews.title: A valuable car vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: The PHYSEN PH-11 Car Vacuum Cleaner looks very beautiful and graceful. In addition,It has very nice vacuuming effect while working. It has brought me lots of convenience in cleaning my car. I like this product.
customer_reviews.author: Haiying Chen

customer_reviews.title: Great and super convenient
customer_reviews.text: With my local car wash closed due to the Covid sutuation, my car has been sorely neglected. I needed a vacuum. This fit the bill perfectly. No cords and decent suction. It is not as powerful, obviously as the car wash vacuum. Howrver, having this in my car means more frequent minor cleaning. I do not need the deep sucyion clean if I am keeping up every week or two with a minor 5 minute touch up. I love it. I am going to get another to keep inside neary cat litter boxes.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kordasiewicz

customer_reviews.title: very useful
customer_reviews.text: I have a car. Now you know why I need to vacuum. It is small and compact and can be easily installed in the front seat next to the console. It charges quickly, let me quickly clean up all the Cheerios, pretzels, and she knows what else the children have fallen on the floor and on the car seat. I think everyone has one!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Thiel

customer_reviews.title: Very portable tool
customer_reviews.text: I was scouring the internet for a handy hand held vacuum cleaner that wouldn’t take up a ton of storage place in my small apartment, and this one fits the build! Very effective and surprisingly powerful vacuum. My biggest problem is reaching spider webs in the top corners of my apartment's ceiling. What I love about this vacuum is that it comes with a lot of accessories, which I use to access hard to reach nooks and crannies of my place.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Consiglio

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! No setup required for volume adjustment or sound ...
customer_reviews.text: I received the order quickly. 3 receivers and two buttons. Out of the box, each button was able to play a loud traditional chime sound "ding-dong (short pause) ding-dong" on each receiver. Perfect! No setup required for volume adjustment or sound selection. Just plug and play. I also would like to point out that the three receivers were sync'd in perfect time so that if you have multiple receivers within earshot, the chimes sound at the exact same time and sound as one. I placed one upstairs, one downstairs and one in my woodworking shop (an 80ft distance). The tone easily cuts through my shop power tool noises and loudly played music. I couldn't be happier with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Donald A Meger

customer_reviews.title: No support
customer_reviews.text: Unit works well when working. One of my receivers quit working and will not pair. These are made in China so it is a overseas call. And both the email addresses on the Pysen web site do not work!
customer_reviews.author: Danny Delashaw

customer_reviews.title: The car vacuum is great!
customer_reviews.text: The car vacuum is good quality ,I really satisfied when i got it .it’s very easy to assemble. sometimes kids make messy in the car that is so difficult to clean it . but now i got this car vacuum to help me ,it makes me feel easy to clean my car .I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: xiaoli lin

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly powerful suction
customer_reviews.text: We live in an apartment so I have no way of vacuuming my car unless we pay to have it cleaned. Now I can clean my car myself. This little vacuum is surprisingly powerful and suctions really well. The attachments are really helpful because I can get into the cup holder and cracks between the seats. Comes with a carrying bag too and the cord is long enough to reach my back seats. Great buy if you like to keep your car clean!
customer_reviews.author: sara k

customer_reviews.title: East setup and great coverage.
customer_reviews.text: These doorbells are very easy to setup. I am impressed with the quality and the ringer choices. I have two front doors and each end of the house and it is nice to be able to tell which door someone is at. With three receivers I get great coverage through my large house. Hopefully they will survive the winter rains.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely do not recommend this product. First use it burned out the charger ports in my SUV after 5 minutes. Very disappointed in this product. 👎 I don't know why this vacuum has so much 5-5 stars good reviews. U ordered it but totally disappointed for the suction. It is already dirty be caused I used in once, but I should return it back to the seller
customer_reviews.author: M&M

customer_reviews.title: Convenient little sanity-saver
customer_reviews.text: Trying to keep my minivan clean with 3 young kids! I was tired of hauling the shopvac out every other weekend so I picked up this little handheld one to use on-the-go. I can use it while I'm sitting at the carwash, waiting for a grocery pickup order, or even mid-roadtrip when my kids decide to dump out all of their snacks. I'll still break out the shopvac for a deeper clean but the suction and quality on this one is decent. It could've come with a sturdier hose but otherwise I've enjoyed the convenience of having it available any time I want to clean up. The little garbage bags and carrying case it came with were an unexpected bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Does what its supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? I have a car plus 2 messy kids so a portable vacuum was engraved in my future lol. Its small but powerful and works using your car charging port which means you can clean as you go! The absolute best part is its kid friendly so I make the little monsters clean as the mess up so my car smells like a little dirt instead of landfill. The price is a plus too! Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ally Cat

customer_reviews.title: Easy to program the 2 buttons for two different tones
customer_reviews.text: Had no issues programming the sounds, except hard to cycle from teh beginning of the 52 tones to pick the one wanted. At one point, one of the 3 would not change tones, when I tried to reprogram - it would not "take" it. So left it on the one tone.Still, a very handy product. Easy to program the 2 buttons for two different tones.
customer_reviews.author: G. Fisk

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaning tool for the car
customer_reviews.text: Live this little vacuum. It is powered by using the lighter and it cleans not only the mats and between the seat. It comes with a long cord and we have no problem to use it in a Nissan Frontier truck! It is much powerful than than the cordless vacuum because it actually connects to a live power source. Great tool to have around if you have kids, pets, or a messy husband!
customer_reviews.author: EAB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling with kids
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is great for the car when you have kids or transport messy goods like potting soil. It's light weight and easily stowed in its bag. The cord is long enough to reach from the front to the back of the car with ease. The attachments help tackle various messes. With an ac adapter the vacuum can also be used in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping for better quality. I take my dog just about everywhere with me so the hair is awful. Unfortunately this vacuum doesn't work very good on the hair which is basically why I purchased it. Also the cord pulled right out of the plug the first time I used it. Quality just doesn't seem that great. But it was fairly inexpensive. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum for the car
customer_reviews.text: Yay, I'm so excited. I finally got to use this to clean my car and it seems like it's working really well. I like that I can plug it into the outlet and use it that way and the suction is pretty good. It's awesome because I can leave it in my car and if crumbs or something drop, boom it's right there in my car and I could just clean it up
customer_reviews.author: April A.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set up. Multiple sound units can be heard easily thru out home. Loudness adjustment is handy for volume control in different areas of the house. Great wireless coverage for spread out 2500 sq ft house from courtyard gate to Garage. The push button is great looking but it doesnt look like a normal door bell button. I drew a "bell" icon on the button with a grey sharpie for my design challenged friends. I used the default tones, perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Dsrtjohn

customer_reviews.title: great car vacuum! easy to store, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Overall the car vacuum had decent suction power, I had no problem with it when I'm trying to clean my car interior. I love the many different tools that come with the vacuum, I use them to clean hard to clean area. The trash bag that come with it is a plus! not many car vauum out there come it trash bags!
customer_reviews.author: cho

customer_reviews.title: Good Unit.
customer_reviews.text: We had a wireless doorbell that just simply sounded bad and we paid more for it than this one which sounds a lot better. Installation was easy. We have one receiver on the 2nd floor and one on the 1st floor. When the door bell is pushed the two receivers are in perfect synchronization with each other. The third receiver I placed in my office/shop as I work from home and have deliveries and customer stopping by. Works great. I highly recommend this wireless doorbell kit.
customer_reviews.author: D.N.

customer_reviews.title: Great. Loud or soft
customer_reviews.text: Great. Loud or soft. Way too many ring choices. Must cycle through 50 or 60 choices if you miss the one you wanted. Some are stupid rings which I would never use, but hey, you never know other people's personal choices. Plenty of ringer choices. Can't turn it completely off though. But it's easy enough to un plug it from the wall if you need silence. It lights up when ringing but since its down near the floor plugged into the wall outlet, deaf people may not notice the light blinking.
customer_reviews.author: N. Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad...
customer_reviews.text: Well if you are anything like me keeping the car clean is not a high priority on the list. This little vac is not only very strong it's also light weight. The filter keeps things clean and you really never have to worry about dirt escaping the machine. The cord is plenty long and what can I say it just works.
customer_reviews.author: Jc

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I decided to buy this mini vacuum cleaner because I had to be going to the car wash and it is tedious to go with a small child, and it worked wonderfully, it is compact it does not take up much space, it works well and it includes a cover for you to put it on, so you vacuum your car when you have time.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Gamez

customer_reviews.title: compact
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for the car. The suction isn't extremely strong the way a vacuum from a car wash place or an in-home vacuum is, but remember, its plugged into your car. I like it and it does clean up the mess. Comes in a nice carrying case. I love the extensions it comes with and the wire does give a lot of room to move! I definitely would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Mikaela

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and loud!!!
customer_reviews.text: fantastic product, excellent range , got it installed almost 100 feet from the house with no problems!!! Great sounds , need to learn to set them to select one , but great product , very very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Monica Zanardi

customer_reviews.title: Extraordinary
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little cleaner to help clean my car and small places in my house. It’s very strong and picks up lots of dirt and crumbs instantly. I was able to clean my (very) messy car within minutes - it looked like a brand new car! Definitely recommend :)
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: Loud enough and problem free (so far)
customer_reviews.text: this has good range and volume u need an outlet for receivers but not necessarily one that is close to where you want to hear it from. I have had no problems at all. other battery operated push buttons stuck in the "on" position and freaked my dog out by ringing entire time I was gone one day. Poor Baby!!
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Very handy vacuum for my car.
customer_reviews.text: I have my little rental car business as my side job. Recent health issue needs me clean my car often than ever, this little vacuum set is very handy and small enough to keep it inside of my car without taking up too much space. I would buy a few more for my other cars.
customer_reviews.author: Vijay

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: This is very good for the price. It's specifically for the car though because it comes with unattachable charging cord that goes into the car. It comes with a hose to use as extension and also the garbage bags are included. Its easy to use and to clean.
customer_reviews.author: anatoly

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait so long?
customer_reviews.text: Doorbell broke years ago, and I can't believe I waited so long to buy this. These work perfectly and are super easy to get up and running out of the box. (And I'm not good at that sort of thing.) It's nice to have receivers in different rooms, so we can hear the doorbell from the back of the house or while doing dishes, running water, etc. And we can set the volume as well. We've had this up for a few months now, and it's still working great!
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Best handheld car vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Seriously hands down the best car vacuum. I was a little nervous about the suction and if it would reach to my backseat. However the cord is very long, and the suction is great! It’s like going to use the car wash vacuums except this is handheld and can reach far more places! It has different nozzles to attach and is very easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Claressa

customer_reviews.title: What a value for a great product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my mom because she had problems hearing her exsisting doorbell. I set them up in a few minutes. She now has two receivers on the first floor and one on the second floor. They are nice and loud. One transmitter on the front door and one on the rear door and each have its own tone. Great buy for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: powerful little unit
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised by its function! It's light weight, fits in the hand nicely, super long cord which made it really nice for using in my pontoon boat! I put to the challenge in my old truck and it works pretty good!
customer_reviews.author: M. Wentzel

customer_reviews.title: Super convenient
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient car vacuum. I was looking for something that would be easy to vacuum out my car every week and this worked out perfectly. Great suction, convenient plug for the car, and very good quality. Thinking about buying one for my family also!
customer_reviews.author: Mady Askins

customer_reviews.title: Great product for being on the go!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for spills and quick cleanups when you’re on the go. It comes with a handy carrying case and a few attachments. The cord is long enough that you can reach all areas of your car. Especially helpful with kids who spill both crumbs or drinks!
customer_reviews.author: Emily H.

customer_reviews.title: Can't recommend it for the long term
customer_reviews.text: Bought these two years ago. Cycling thru all the tones/chimes to set it was kind of a drag. But you really only have to do it once. They worked well for about 18 months or so. Then one receiver unit died. Then another. Finally the 3rd just went. At first I thought it was a transmitter battery issue. But after replacing the batteries, they receivers still did not function. Can't recommend it for the long term. Sorry Physen.
customer_reviews.author: E. Gattsek

customer_reviews.title: Great for a fast clean
customer_reviews.text: So I just got this for my boyfriend’s truck because he can not keep it clean and I just tested it on his floor and it work! I would definitely recommend this for your vehicle! Above is before and after pictures
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Vernon

customer_reviews.title: Not for dog hair!!!
customer_reviews.text: This car vacuum is no good for dog hair on fabric seats! I have a Great Pyrenees that shed all over my backseat & this vacuum virtually picked up none of it. It was great for crumbs in the cup holders or dirt particles on the floor board but it did absolutely nothing for the dog hair, which was my main reason for purchasing. Also, it is extremely cheap plastic but that is to be expected for the price. I will be returning it for a more expensive, stronger vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Car only. Wanted it for more.
customer_reviews.text: I loved how it looked and felt. Unfortunately I want to be able to use this around my house or my office so I returned it since it only plugs into a lighter thingy in the car. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Willow

customer_reviews.title: Cleans efficiently
customer_reviews.text: I liked this vacuum cleaner. Cleans efficiently. It’s just 19.99 and it’s able to perform the cleaning nicely. Cleans 90% of the dirt, except the small particles sticked to my mat. But definitely my car looked very clean after doing the vacuum. Easy to use, very light weight and easy to remove trash after using it
customer_reviews.author: Raghava Pavan

customer_reviews.title: Good for small cleans , little suction
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to use and clean but doesn’t have a lot of suction power. It also doesn’t work unless the car is running which I find odd . Good for mall clean ups but not big ones
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Valdez

customer_reviews.title: This thing sucks
customer_reviews.text: Not like going to a car wash, and it doesn’t do much for floor mats.. but it’s okay for cleaning up after the kids and getting crumbs off the seats.
customer_reviews.author: AtomicMilk

customer_reviews.title: Sucks...Just Like I Should
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm! Suction is good, and it is very easy to set up and use. I work as a delivery driver on the weekends, and I keep this for emergencies and spills.
customer_reviews.author: Malissa C. Watkins

customer_reviews.title: It’s very nice
customer_reviews.text: All Over Clean for Wet &Dry Use- PHYSEN Corded Car Vacuum cleaner reach every spot with the 16.4ft long power cord,can effective and fast remove all the dirt on car,support dry and wet use, you'll never have to worry about cleaning those hard to reach places again.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Mao

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great car vacuum cleaner! It comes with a storage bag so it majes it easy to store inside my car. It is also easy to clean- just rinse with water
customer_reviews.author: Evan haight

customer_reviews.title: Has some power!
customer_reviews.text: Got this vacuum pretty fast. It works great and sucks up all the stuff that gets onto my floorboards. The little bag that comes with it is pretty cool to.
customer_reviews.author: S. Sparke

customer_reviews.title: This product very cool and come with bag
customer_reviews.text: So what I like about this product Physen is it works well in the car it can get in very tight spaces. This vacuum os awesome. The suction of the dirt particular come up easily. What I dislike about it you can’t use it outside of a car or plug in outlets as if you’re using a home vacuum cleaner. I used Physen to vacuum my vehicle the seats floor mats between seats and hard to reach places.
customer_reviews.author: praphatson phromphan

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: This item is absolutely incredible! It has SO many sounds to choose from and the volume is perfect! Shocked at how great they are for the price! It is also great for giving to a loved one that may need help upstairs/downstairs. Very helpful to my mom when she needs me.
customer_reviews.author: ericat1731

customer_reviews.title: Cute vacuum for the car
customer_reviews.text: Very cute little vacuum. Comes with attachments to get in smaller spaces. Suction is pretty good. Only thing I would like better is if it had a chargeable battery vs having to have my car on to use it
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Powerful little machine
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 kids and a minivan and this is a God send. I'm so glad I got this. It makes it easier than lugging my big vacuum out of my house.
customer_reviews.author: Joel and Carrie Smith

customer_reviews.title: The car like its!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Anybody that's ever hung out with kids understands the need for this handy little vac!! Cereal, fruit snacks on the floor?? It's all good they'll be there no more with this vac!! Easy to use. Convenient to store. And works good!!
customer_reviews.author: Winky Jones

customer_reviews.title: Love the new doorbell
customer_reviews.text: Love the new doorbell! We have the front and back doors synced to different tunes so we know what door the person is at. We put a receiver in my husbands detached garage and it is working well all the way in the back yard. We are looking forward to using the Christmas tunes next month so we know when are Amazon packages are being dropped off!
customer_reviews.author: Boatingmama

customer_reviews.title: Powerful suction, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy this is to use and how well it works! No more lugging my car vacuum outside with an extension cord. I can now vacuum my car anywhere, anytime!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Bock

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Cleaned my car in 15 minutes. Light-weight and has a long power cable. I don’t have to pay for vacuum at the gas station anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Irina Flores

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum helps to keep my car clean!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly the car vacuum I was looking for. Sufficient suction power that makes cleaning little food and dirts easily. Now I don’t need to worry my child dropping any crackers.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona

customer_reviews.title: Convenient cleaning!
customer_reviews.text: So glad to come across this for the cars. We live in a condo so I’m not able to drag a vacuum out to clean and I don’t like spending money to go vacuum them out. Great buy and when the little one makes a mess is to keep clean now. Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M Troy

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Easy to operate, send suction head quite practical, can be sucked to a lot of corners of the place. Sucked a lot of dust and hair still have a lot of small sundry, now sanitation is convenient and relaxed.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great modern looking doorbell!
customer_reviews.text: This door bell works right out of the box! It sounds so crisp and it's easy adjust the volume on each chime. The one that's in the basement doesn't need to be as loud as the main floor etc.. i like that it looks modern so it isn't an eye soar if it's plugged into a visible socket. For the money this is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: twhite

customer_reviews.title: Buy batteries if you buy these units
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Wouldn't work. Both batteries were died. It works 100' away. Manual is for different doorbell, so no way of changing the tunes for the other button.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Kopseng

customer_reviews.title: Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Next to no suction. Have to have direct contact to Any dirt to get it to suck up then half the time it falls out after you shut off. Will be returning
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum sucks honestly. It picks up stuff but drops it right back. Not sure what i was doing wrong but i just couldnt grt it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Elena ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Many bell selections. The sounds are excellent.
customer_reviews.text: I liked that there are 3 receivers. I want to use the second doorbell for my mailbox. I would have liked one more louder volume choice. I like the quality of the sounds. ( I made an electronic door bell 32 years ago, so I know how they should sound).
customer_reviews.author: John R. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Love this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it’s lightweight and it comes with trash bags. Also I liked that i can clean the back of the trunk without putting down the seats because it has a long cable. I love it
customer_reviews.author: DENNIS BARRIOS

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing for me. Gets small crumbs and leaves my car mats looking clean. Definitely a steal for what you’re paying for. The only down I found was the attachments aren’t the best but for this price I think it does more than enough. Would recommend to someone who wants a cheap but working car vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Gissel

customer_reviews.title: The power
customer_reviews.text: I love this vac the power and suction all great!
customer_reviews.author: C Richardson

customer_reviews.title: A Great Find
customer_reviews.text: FInally found the perfect doorbell. The bell travels through metal doors and concrete walls. A great find!!
customer_reviews.author: Giving Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I live in an apartment where I don’t have power outlet in the parking lot. This product made my life very easy. Works perfectly fine and has a good suction power. It is very easy to use, just plug it to the car and it works!
customer_reviews.author: laasya tumma

customer_reviews.title: Actually works as advertised.  Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: Cool design. Works well. I put the recievers all over my house and synchronized the tone. I've sent two previous wireless doorbells back. This is the first that's really worked as well as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. David J. Shuman

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Suction is not great. But ok for quick clean up
customer_reviews.author: Ethel PA

customer_reviews.title: Must get one if you have kids!
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum comes with some trash bags, and it has a portable carrying bag. It is very convenient and easy to clean my car with it. Recommend it if you have kids!
customer_reviews.author: Jason-

customer_reviews.title: Great for a big family
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for any large family. It is easy to use and also clean. I would buy a second for my other car.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Rockefeller

customer_reviews.title: Great product that works right.
customer_reviews.text: Worked right out of the box. Easy and quick installation. Seems to be very well designed and built, works every time it's pressed. No hassles, no problems, since installing it several months ago.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: It looks good,and it works very well.
customer_reviews.text: It's small and portabie. I like to snack on the car . The vacuum cleans very well.It works very well. Make my car very clean.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Centlivre

customer_reviews.title: Small but powerful
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is pretty good for picking up sand after going to the beach. It works really well and I like it. It comes with a nice carrying case. You don't need an extension cable as it works out of the car cigarette lighter adapter. I would recommend this product to my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Alabina

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a doorbell I could hear from different parts of my house and also to know which doorbell was ringing without having to run from door to door. This is the perfect door bell for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mary A. McClellan

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work. I bought ten of them thinking it would be more effective if it was all over the house. The ants show up as usual. It does not work!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Mancusi

customer_reviews.title: Super package choice !
customer_reviews.text: Nice to have multiple receivers for many places. So easy to relocate if needed. Used factory chime out of box, just plugged in and happy. 70 feet to garage and works fine.
customer_reviews.author: NJ tradesman

customer_reviews.title: don't get it
customer_reviews.text: Don't really have any power when it comes to sucking up the dirt or fur.. It connected good with my car and all the tools was in it.. I highly don't recommend this to anyone - it's performance is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Nneka Mackey

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is easy to use. It also stores very well. I am overall pleased with the function of the product.
customer_reviews.author: PBaker

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use and comes with a couple of accessories. Wanted to just use for simple dirt pick up in my new Audi- it was WEAK suction and so disappointing. Do not waste your time waiting on this product to come in! Took it back after one use.
customer_reviews.author: Cammi Pierce

customer_reviews.title: user-friendly vacuum and good deal!
customer_reviews.text: good review and good deal for this vacuum. This is easy to clean my car with 5.5KPa stronger suction, 100W high-performance motor. After using this, its easy to clean. Many tools for different needs and edges. Like it!!
customer_reviews.author: Eva L.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great doorbell. I have two different chimes
customer_reviews.text: This is a great doorbell. I have two different chimes , so I can be able to know which door to go too. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Eda Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good alternative for a decent price
customer_reviews.text: I’m very excited to finally have a handheld car vacuum. In the past I’ve had to use the floor vacuum just to pick up the debris in my car and this car vacuum will be a good alternative. It has decent suction power and picked up dirt from my car.
customer_reviews.author: Namita B.

customer_reviews.title: It does clean
customer_reviews.text: Power is good and it does clean the dust from my Accord. It comes with a storage bag and it is easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: P Lee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very good product and strong suction power can clean efficiently
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Allen

customer_reviews.title: Power
customer_reviews.text: Like the product, but it doesn't have as much power like l thought i would. It is good for cleaing cars n l used it.
customer_reviews.author: Ms E.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Wireless system worked as advertised. I bought three doorbell and two buttons. I upstairs, one in basement and one in carport behind house. Buttons are front and rear doors. Greatest distance over 120 feet and no degradation at all. Setup took less than 20 minutes including drilling brick for both buttons. Extremely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. H.

customer_reviews.title: U feat anywhere in the car
customer_reviews.text: Really good product and come in a bag u can leave at the car .. it’s really good for the ones who have kids easy to clean 🧽
customer_reviews.author: Julia Ramos

customer_reviews.title: A welcome addition for cleaning my csr
customer_reviews.text: I thought the suction of this vacuum would be little more powerful but all in all it does a good job with ample attachments .
customer_reviews.author: James A. Equals

customer_reviews.title: Terrible suction.
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Not sure why the other reviews are all so great. This vacuum cleaner has terrible suction. I was very disappointed with it. Returning immediately 😔
customer_reviews.author: Cassidi Mugica

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it for the price
customer_reviews.text: My advise, pay a little more and get something better. The vacuum worked great the first car but when it came to the second the suction power was so weak I might as well hand pick the crumbs. Returning asap.
customer_reviews.author: Nam

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this and my mom loves this. Bought it for her after she had surgery and, although she lives in a relatively small home, it was possible her calls for assistance would not be heard. This was the perfect solution.
customer_reviews.author: SierraSun

customer_reviews.title: We replaced with this door bell system, so that ...
customer_reviews.text: We replaced with this door bell system, so that we could hear the bell in our lower level walkout basement. It rings in our kitchen, basement and master. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Petite

customer_reviews.title: Not Into It
customer_reviews.text: Well the suction isn't as a strong as I thought it would be to me waste of money i could've bought one with better suction a bit disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Diana M.

customer_reviews.title: Love how it works right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned if the receiver in the basement (main reason I got this) was within reach. Perfect. Everything works great and volume is just the level I need. Great product so far.
customer_reviews.author: AHNBH

customer_reviews.title: Great Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I have two toddlers and they drop everything on the seat and the floor. It’s a powerful small vacuum with a lot of attachable options. Easy to clean and empty. Easy to set up and the cable is long enough to reach the back.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Suction
customer_reviews.text: After reading all these positive reviews I thought this was going to be great. It wasn’t. The suction is not at all what I thought it would be, unless mines is defective. Barely vacuumed up anything in my car..
customer_reviews.author: Fakoosa

customer_reviews.title: All the doorbells work...... ...
customer_reviews.text: All the doorbells work............and I've had them for several months. One problem is that my doors are too close to each other so there's only one type of ring.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: it works fine and good distance
customer_reviews.text: it works fine and good distance, but the different sounds for the door bell -electronic piano short announcements do not impress me. I only found 4-5 sounds I like or would use- But it does work
customer_reviews.author: RCW
